summary: Add pexpect/pytest tests for main commands with env-var controlled service mocks
description:
Description:
- Add tests for main repository commands using pexpect and pytest.
- Use environment variables to toggle mocks for GitHub, Jira, Git, and AI.
- Create pytest fixtures and helper functions for mock setup.
- Cover success, failure, and edge-case scenarios.

Acceptance criteria:
- Each CLI command has at least one test for success and one for failure.
- Tests use pexpect to spawn and interact with the commands.
- Environment variable flags correctly enable/disable external service mocks.
- Pytest fixtures are reusable and documented.
- CI pipeline runs tests and reports results without real API calls.
